name: You are The Enemy (Weekly Game Jam 150) - unfinished
name_original: You are The Enemy (Weekly Game Jam 150) - unfinished
description:
An RTS-style game in which you are tasked with a simple mission, accompany your troops into the enemy base and destroy everything in your path, or die trying. Unfortunately I couldn't quite get my minion AI and respawning system finished in time, but I'm still happy being able to produce some functional code in the meantime.

Q - fireball, your only working ability, but it won't really matter because the game's completely broken, lol!

Right-Click to attack stuff. Definitely not done working on this either.

--Didn't finish this, but wanted to submit what i did make.
